name: Apex Evolution
description: Choose a power feat, and you may take this feature multiple times.

name: Enhanced Physiology
description: Increase your Constitution by 1 and any other ability score of your choice by 1. You may take this feature multiple times.

name: Enhanced Strength
description: Your strength score is doubled for carry capacity. Advantage on Strength checks and saving throws.

name: Power Advancement
description: Increase the power score of any two of your inborn powers by 1; you may take this feature multiple times.

name: Power Focus
description: Choose one of your inborn powers, increases its power score by 2.

name: Resilient Constitution
description: +2 Constitution saves, resistance to poison. Repeatable, +1 each time to max +5.

name: Superhuman Speed
description: Apply full dexterity modifier to pace. +1 area pace or +1 avoidance. Take twice for both.

name: Versatile Power
description: Choose one power you possess and gain a new power stunt associated with that power.

name: Power Surge
description: Roll 2d4 and add that to one power score until the end of your turn. Once per long rest.

name: Apex Power Surge
description: 1 min. bonus: 2d6 to one power and half to another, -1 burnout. Repeatable at Theta level.
